title: Name Recognition pt1
text: This person was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize and made significant contributions to the study of radioactivity.

title: Name Recognition pt2
text: Hint: She is known for discovering radium and polonium, and her name is closely tied to the term 'radioactivity.'

title: Name Recognition pt3
text: She was the first woman to win a Nobel Prize, and she won it in both Physics and Chemistry.
